author: UltPanda
description: A suggestion system for Discord communities. Users can submit suggestions that will be posted to a designated channel. Community members can vote on suggestions with reactions, and staff can approve or deny suggestions.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the Suggestion cog! Use `[p]help suggestion` to see all available commands, and make sure to set up the suggestion channel with `[p]suggestionset channel`.
short: Community suggestion system with voting and staff approval
